scripts.imsg: pnpm -s version:sync && pnpm -s deps:patch && swift run imsg
scripts.lint: swift format lint --recursive Sources Tests && swiftlint
scripts.test: pnpm -s version:sync && pnpm -s deps:patch && swift test
scripts.build: pnpm -s version:sync && pnpm -s deps:patch && mkdir -p bin && swift build -c release --product imsg && cp .build/release/imsg bin/imsg
